Assess joint means between scrambled interaction pairs for ligands and receptors across cell types

ligand_receptor_scramble.Rd

Assess joint means between scrambled interaction pairs for ligands and receptors across cell types

ligand_receptor_scramble(
  ligand_receptor_means,
  ligand_mean_dataframe,
  receptor_mean_dataframe,
  ligand_receptor_pairs,
  number_cell_types,
  scramble_times
)

Arguments

ligand_receptor_means

Tibble generated by ligand_receptor_means function. Used to generate create a joint expression weighting for ligand receptor pairs.
ligand_mean_dataframe

Mean expression values for ligands across cells from a given condition
receptor_mean_dataframe

Mean expression values for receptors across cells from a given condition
ligand_receptor_pairs

Data.frame of ligands, receptors and interactions in the format of ramilowski_pairs provided by this package
number_cell_types

The number of unique cell types in a given sample or condition. This will be used to assess ligand and receptor interactions across cell types.
scramble_times

Number of times to random pair ligands and receptors to generate a background distribution.

Value

Generates a tibble containing joint resulting from scrambling ligand and receptor pairs.

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Value
